name: Deployment
description: Degree to which secure practices are implemented in the deployment environment and process.

values.name: Formal Verification
values.description: Secure and isolated deployment environment with continuous monitoring, automated security patching, and formal verification of the deployment process.

values.name: Secure Environment
values.description: Secure deployment environment with strong authentication and authorization, regular security updates, and intrusion detection systems.

values.name: Basic Security Measures
values.description: Basic security measures in the deployment environment, but no strong authentication or authorization mechanisms.

values.name: Insecure Environment
values.description: Insecure deployment environment, no access controls or security monitoring, model deployed on publicly accessible servers without any protection.
